name: v1.0.11
body:
ʕ◔ϖ◔ʔ Release v1.0.11

* Fix panic (by @wzshiming at #73)
* Update k8s.io dependencies to v0.17.0 (by @ghouscht at #74)

name: v1.0.10
body:
ʕ◔ϖ◔ʔ Release v1.0.10

Bug fixes:

* Fix a bug of completion when using `logs -f` option (#65).
* Start prompt if users don't have a permission to list namespaces (#70).
* Fix a bug of context suggestions contains a blank item (#71).

Internal changes:

* Build kube-prompt binaries with Go 1.13 (#66).

name: v1.0.9
body:
ʕ◔ϖ◔ʔ Release v1.0.9

* Support container name suggestions. (#64)

name: v1.0.8
body:
ʕ◔ϖ◔ʔ Release v1.0.8

*  Added support to build ARM32 binary (#61) by @kopwei

name: v1.0.7
body:
ʕ◔ϖ◔ʔ Release v1.0.7

*  Migrate the version of client-go to v12.0
* Migrate to go modules.
* Add -o and --output as skipNext options
* Don't complete pod name when input 'get pod -o'
* Support --output=json style options

ʕ◔ϖ◔ʔ Release v1.0.6

* Fix namespace handling. Determine the namespace to use in following orders (refs https://github.com/c-bata/kube-prompt/pull/42).
    1. Use a command-line flag if it exists `--namespace` (or `-n`).
    2. Use the namespace of current context.
* Fix the bug that ingress completer doesn't work (refs https://github.com/c-bata/kube-prompt/pull/36).
* Add feature to complete jobs (refs https://github.com/c-bata/kube-prompt/pull/33).
* Deliver linux-arm64 binary (refs https://github.com/c-bata/kube-prompt/issues/32).
    * See https://github.com/c-bata/kube-prompt#installation for more details.
* Support `oidc` and `openstack` plugin (refs https://github.com/c-bata/kube-prompt/pull/41).

ʕ◔ϖ◔ʔ Release v1.0.5

* Fix bug when input `--`. refs #29.
* Add -n to namespace completion handler #9

name: v1.0.4
body:
ʕ◔ϖ◔ʔ Release v1.0.4

* Update go-client v08.0.0, k8s v1.11.
* Update go-prompt v0.2.2.
    * See https://github.com/c-bata/go-prompt/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#v022-20180628 for more details.
* Improve file path completions by using FilePathCompleter in go-prompt.
    * See https://github.com/c-bata/go-prompt/pull/79 for more details.
* Change default namespace to all.
* Support namespace completions.

ʕ◔ϖ◔ʔ Release v1.0.3

* Update go-prompt (it contains the change to fix race condition)
* Support the file path completing.

ʕ◔ϖ◔ʔ Release v1.0.2

![kube-prompt-port-forward](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5564044/31506179-b43c0736-afb1-11e7-9357-e4fd35c195b0.gif)

* Support completion for port-forwarding
* Support namespace completion
* Add edit deployments and replicationcontrollers completions

ʕ◔ϖ◔ʔ Release v1.0.1

* Update completion of `kubectl delete`
* Add `exit` command to exit kube-prompt
* Fix the bug that kube-prompt is stop when type `Ctrl-C` in `kubectl logs`.
